definition: having a color between blue and violet, a blue-violet color
details:
adjective
- having a color between blue and violet
= example: having a color between blue and violet
noun
- a blue-violet color
- deciduous subshrub of southeastern Asia having pinnate leaves and clusters of red or purple flowers
= example: deciduous subshrub of southeastern Asia having pinnate leaves and clusters of red or purple flowers
= synonyms: indigo plant
- a blue dye obtained from plants or made synthetically
= synonyms: anil, indigotin
